channel.title: FreeDNS on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari
channel.description: Recent content in FreeDNS on Prajwol Bikram Adhikari

item.title: Part 3: A High-Availability DNS Network with AdGuard Home
item.description: Learn to build a high-availability, ad-blocking DNS network with AdGuard Home. This step-by-step guide covers deploying on a homelab server, a free Oracle Cloud VM, and using Docker macvlan for ultimate redundancy.
